com.github.valid8j.pcond.experimentals.currying

Enum CurriedFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<CurriedFunctions>
      • com.github.valid8j.pcond.experimentals.currying.CurriedFunctions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<CurriedFunctions>

    public enum CurriedFunctions
extends Enum<CurriedFunctions>

    A class that collects methods to create functions and predicates in experimental stage.

      • nest

        public static Function<Stream<?>,Stream<CurriedContext>> nest(Collection<?> inner)

        This function is used to construct a function which replaces 'nested loop' in a usual programming.

        Parameters:
        inner - A collection for the "inner loop".
        Returns:
        A function to construct a nested structure.

      • toCurriedContextStream

        public static Function<Stream<?>,Stream<CurriedContext>> toCurriedContextStream()

        Returns a converter function for a stream. The function converts a stream of objects into and returns a stream of contexts each of which hols a value from the original stream.

        Returns:
        A function to convert an object stream into context stream.
        See Also:
        CurriedContext

      • toCurriedContext

        public static <T> Function<T,CurriedContext> toCurriedContext()

        Returns a function to convert a value into a context that holds the original value.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the original value.
        Returns:
        A function to convert a value into a context.

      • toCurriedContextPredicate

        public static <T> Predicate<CurriedContext> toCurriedContextPredicate(Predicate<T> predicate_,
                                                                      int argIndex)

        Creates a context function that tests the value at the specified index using the given predicate.

        Type Parameters:
        T - An expected type of value to be tested.
        Parameters:
        predicate_ - A predicate with which the value is tested.
        argIndex - An index to specify a value in the context.
        Returns:
        A new predicate to test a value in a context.

      • toCurriedContextPredicate

        public static <T> Predicate<CurriedContext> toCurriedContextPredicate(Predicate<T> predicate)

        Converts a predicate to a context predicate which tests the first value in a context using the predicate.

        Type Parameters:
        T - An expected type of the input value.
        Parameters:
        predicate - A predicate to be converted
        Returns:
        A context predicate.

      • toCurriedContextPredicate

        public static Predicate<CurriedContext> toCurriedContextPredicate(CurriedFunction<Object,Object> curriedFunction,
                                                                  int... orderArgs)

        Converts a curried function which results in a boolean value into a predicate.

        Parameters:
        curriedFunction - A curried function to be converted.
        orderArgs - An array to specify the order in which values in the context are applied to the function.
        Returns:
        A predicate converted from the given curried function.

      • parameterizedPredicate

        public static <T> ParameterizedPredicateFactory.Builder<T> parameterizedPredicate(String name)

        Returns a builder for a factory to create a predicate. The factory accepts an argument to create a new predicate. With this method, you can create predicates with different values.

        Suppose, you are about to create a predicate that tests a given string starts with "hello". At the same time, you also want to create a predicate that checks the value using "こんにちは". You can do it with the factory built by the returned value of this method.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The expected type of the value to be tested by the final predicate.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the predicate. It will be followed by the value passed to the factory in the `pcond’s output.
        Returns:
        A builder to create a predicate factory.

      • parameterizedFunction

        public static <T,R> ParameterizedFunctionFactory.Builder<T,R> parameterizedFunction(String name)

        Returns a builder for a factory to create a function.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The expected type of the input value to the final function.
        R - The expected type of the output value of the final function.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the function. It will be followed by the value passed to the factory in the `pcond’s output.
        Returns:
        A builder to create a function factory.
        See Also:
        parameterizedPredicate(String)
